|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25N01GVZE1G; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Nuvoton;NUC123;onchip; |flash2size = 68 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nuvoton;NUC980;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 20 KiB |ram2chip = Nuvoton;NUC123;onchip; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101GR; |eth3chip = IC+;IP101GR; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 08:00:27
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2016.11;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.115;Buildroot;

|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, unpopulated,, CON3
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, RS485, RS232, UART, I2C, SPI, ADC, CAN, GPIO, |addchip = 3,3V to 5.5V Two-channel RS-232 Line Driver/Receiver;TI;SN75C3232E;;2;,,, 3.3V RS-485 Transceiver;TI;SN65HDV11;;2;,,, High Efficiency Step Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7103;;3;,,, Charger Protection IC;Anpec;APL3211A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.0.100 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Nuvoton]] [https://www.nuvoton.com/products/microprocessors/arm9-mpus/nuc980-industrial-control-iot-series/nuc980dk61yc/ NU980] ARM926EJ-S @300MHz *Storage: 128MB SPI NAND flash + Micro SD (TF) slot *RAM: Built-in 64MB DDR2 *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Type A, 1x USB 2.0 Micro-B *Network: 2x Fast Ethernet *Power Source: 5V/2A barrel or USB Female Micro-B
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:NuMaker-NUC980-Serial-Server.png 1807591164.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
